p.dialogue: "I sometimes find inspiration in the most unlikely of places."
"I used to find rain depressing when I lived in the city. But here in Stardew Valley it's beautiful."
"Good morning! I got up early and did some mushroom hunting. Here, take one.[281 404 420 257]#$e#Searching for mushrooms is like going on a treasure hunt. It's a lot of fun.$h"
"It's days like this I'm really happy about my heavy-duty boots.$h"
"The trees have been begging for this rain... I'm happy for them."
"How was your day? Did you see any animals out there?"
"Don't look too close, it's a work in progress."
"I usually go for salad... but a wet night like this gives me cravings for hot soup.$h"
"It's going to be relaxing to fall asleep on a night like this...$l"
"I made a little wood sculpture today, but it was so ugly I threw it into the fire.$u#$e#I think to become a great artist, you have to be critical of your own work."
"I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to get under the covers and stay warm."
"How was your day today, dear? Muddy?"
"This house is a lot nicer than my old cabin! I don't miss it."
"Good morning, @. I've planted these in a little pot out back... [16 18 20 22 90 259 396 402]#$e#I grew that with great love and attention. Enjoy it."
"Always remember to keep your eyes peeled for wild food! There's lots out there."

"I was thinking... life's too short to eat bad food. Luckily, we live in one of the best regions for fresh greens and vegetables!#$e#Here, I made you a healthy salad. [196]#$e#I'm surprised you aren't sick of my salad yet!"
"Good morning, @! I made us some coffee.[395]$h#$e#My morning just wouldn't be complete without a hot cup of coffee."
"Something about this time of night makes me thirsty."
"The flow of time is so delicate... even the tiniest decision changes the future forever."
"It's so much lovelier here at night than the garish glow of the city.#$e#Everything worked out perfectly for me. I'm very lucky."
"I never thought I'd receive a mermaid's pendant so soon after moving here! I'm happy about it, though.$l"
"I saw a wild rabbit today. I just wish I could pet one someday. They look so soft..."
"The cool breeze feels nice. It reminds me of living by the river."
"Hmm... I'm going to do some maintenance over here. I just get the urge to do some hammering now and then."
"It's going to be a special day, I can sense it."
"Ah... that smell of fresh dirt. There's nothing quite like it.$h#$e#You can just tell the air is clean here... it feels good in the lungs."
"Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h"
"I'm going to take a nature walk today. I need to get out of the house."
"I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?"
"It's fun to be a parent. I want to make sure %kid1 grows up to have a love for the outdoors."
"We've got a wonderful farm and a full family. Our new life has really turned out well, hasn't it?"
"Living here, I feel like I'm on the summit of a great mountain."
"Did I ever tell you... when you first moved here I had a dream that we'd be together someday."
"Sometimes it's hard not to believe in destiny... the fact that I decided to move here, and that we found each other.#$b#It could've gone entirely differently at any point."
"Wow, you look full of energy today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l"
"Mmm... You smell nice today."
"I was just admiring my wedding amulet... I'll cherish this treasure for the rest of my life.$l"
"Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft."
"@? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h"
"Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!$l"
"Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it.$h"
"I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray."
"I wonder who lived here before us?"
"Don't you have anything to do today?"
"If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me."
"I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time."
"Are we doing okay on money, @?"
"I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?"
"I don't really feel like doing anything today."
"No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty."
"I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?"
"...Do you still love me?$s"
"*sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.$s"
"Are you still happy with me?s"
"Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s"
"Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s"
"You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?$a"
"We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$s"
"I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s"
"You've been so cold to me lately...$s"
"I wonder if I could've done better.$s"
"So, what are we planting this season?"
"That was some way to ring in the new year last night...$l"
"*sigh*... I guess it's time for the 'spring cleaning' again.$s"
"Ah, summer... I can smell the spice berries already.$h"
"Sorry if I'm wet to the touch... I was sweating all night in the heat."
"It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them."
"I love fall for the mushroom hunting opportunities. It comes and goes pretty fast."
"Have you planned for winter at all? It's good to have a stockpile of hay."
"I know harvest season is a busy time for you. I'll try and help out as much as I can."
"Winter's here, and that means crystal fruit is in season. It has such a unique flavor, don't you think?"
"I'm looking forward to carving ice sculptures tomorrow. I only get to do it once a year, but it's a lot of fun!"
"Hey, here's to another great year at %farm farm! Let's have some fun tonight! [348]$h#$e#Next year is going to be great, I can feel it."
